attributes.action: Remove Theresa May as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May has made a total has as Prime Minister of the United Kindgom.

She has shown a total lack of leadership from the very start of the Brexit negotiations. She panders to MP’s whims and shows total disdain for the will of the people.

She is not fit to lead this country and should be removed immediately.
attributes.background: There’s May is not fit to be PM of the UK.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. That includes asking for people to resign or be sacked. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could search for and sign a petition about that:
https://petition.parliament.uk/

If you would like a general election, you might like to sign this petition instead:

Have another general election https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
